column3:
“Great Stain!

Be warned: you will get munchies and become stupidly lazy. 

Smoked a bowl with a couple of friends,.. ended up going through 4 XL pizzas, content with relaxing on couch and watching stupid random movies and enjoying them. (Kentucky Fried chicken). 

Its really easy to pass out after smoking this strain. Knocked us all out, woke up hungry as hell.

Do not recommend smoking in the morning or afte...”

“Exceptionally Strong. Looking for a clean indica that can make you numb, no pain just relaxation. I find that it's harder and harder these days to find a pure Indica, without some hybridized effects. Just totally hits my body at first I don't notice it at all. Then all of sudden I noticed I am relaxed, if you want that 60's vibe of all peace and no war this is a pure representation of that moment frozen in time. Afgh...”

“Solid 8, started smoking and instantly felt tingley.kept smoking got major munchies,ate dominos.loaded another bowl sat on the  couch was way to stoned to find the remote or get up and put in a movie.sat there smoking and laughing passed out with the pipe in my hand.woke up 9 hours later still in a sitting position with the pipe still in my hand.great for insomnia.not for first timers.”

“Afghan kush is a very strong high and kind of catches you by surprise if you are not prepared. Being the fact that it is a kush gives it points on the potency chart anyway but other than that this strain is extremely potent rating a 19% to 22% Thc content. This strain gives an extreme body high would be strongly recommended for experts not for novices because those who are not prepared or have never had anything this...”
“good for backpain man loved it man”
“this afghan kush is incredible, one of the most potent strains I've EVER had, after just a normal dose" of one small joint I was feeling real good for hrs
column6: it also made me very very relaxed
column7: sleepy and as if I didnt have a care in the world...”"

column3: “This weed brought me back to a peaceful time, before September 11th, 1985”

“A great strain to kickback with your friends and converse about life. Little to no paranoia. Not harsh on the lungs and is a great strain to roll into a joint. Beginners should be careful however, it is a very heavy strain and 2-3 hits will do you good.”
“This indica is true with the indica traits. Horney. Hungry.  Sleepy. Even the head spins are foggy, tight around the cerebral with a low and heavy feeling. Shizits no joke. I love it.”
“After noon  high with the Afghan and she got me feeling ssslllleeeeepppppyyyyyy... and relaxed. A bit aroused too I might add. Oh and hungry too.”

“I'm mostly an Indica kind of guy, so naturally something like this is right up my alley. I've tried it once from Colorado, and once from California. Both times I absolutely loved it.

For people with a lower tolerance, this is definitely a hit it and quit it" type strain. Zero raciness whatsoever
column4: and your whole body from head to toe just gets engulfed in this almost dream-like state of relaxation and laziness. Grea...”"

column3: “I will be honest when I say that I did not expect this strain to be as good as it is. I am a Sativa smoker. That is generally what I prefer. I actually thought this strain was a Sativa, (the first time I smoked it), such was the strength of the heady" high. This was absolutely one of the most potent strains I have ever partaken of. The bud itself produces more kief than any other I have grinder up. I have sworn by S...”"
“This is my favorite indica for stress hands down.  The pain relief is more like prescription ibuprofen,  but the euphoria is outstanding.  Afghan Kush is the wash away the day" strain
column4: or for spending the evening with your lover.   Substitute this for alcohol and you have a mellow
column6: relaxing way to help your mind and body cope with stress!”"

column3: “I have built up a tolerance way faster than I thought I would.  Because of this, I have been searching for a med that will knock my ass out" and allow me to sleep
column4: as at times my brain doesn't want to slow down enough to allow me to relax.  Well.... HELLO AFGHAN KUSH!  This strain didn't just allow me to fall asleep
column5: this one FORCED me to go to bed!  EXACTLY what I was looking for.  Nice fresh buds were a pleasure

column3: “Immediate pain relief, very narcotic in effect.”

“One of my favorite strains. This strains high is very narcotic like and couch-locked me so hard. This strain definitely will give you munchies, after 3 joints and 3 bong rips me and my friends all easily ate 3 pizzas and then got put straight to sleep, Overall I would recommend this strain to help lack of appetite muscle spasms body pain insomnia and if you just want to have a good time 10/10 strain look forward to t...”
“Immediate pain relief, very narcotic in effect.”
“Classic indica in the best sense. Pretty heavy feeling high so if you're prone to couch-lock, this one will tie you down but if you like to get in sort of a trancey place, this will get you there.”

“I remember it was a nice day after I finished my classes and I smoked a selfie l, it was about 3:30 and I walked around the corner to me friends house. I don't remember how I got there and the last thing I remember was her dad saying I was too high (she wasn't a smoker) . I laughed softly cause I was too high to do anything else. the next thing I know its 5 hours later, we are downtown in some restaurant that I never...”

“Great strain. Really good in a medical aspect, really helped with my back and neck pain, totally took away my headache as well. Very strong earthy smell slight spice smell too. The overall taste was a very strong earthy spicy flavour, really nice. Knocks you out and gives you munchies in my case. 3-4 bong hits got me baked.”

“Ordered from dispensary.

I have had this strain many years ago, but this is the first time acquiring it on a medical quality. 

It tastes and smells mostly of a mildew / musty smell, with a slight mango hint, personally rather enjoyable but not the best. The smoke is dense and pretty harsh, but this bud burns incredibly well. Immediately you feel some effects, but it seems to creep upon you within 20 minutes for...”

“About half way through the first bowl hit had already start to hit with a kinda jumpy, energetic type high; takes about 45 min-1 hour to start to come down from the high then it's  a good relaxed feeling for about another hour and a half, good for late in the evening. Taste: more pine and woody taste; did taste a little earthy. An overall good strain, would recommend for anyone dealing with stress, depression, muscle...”

“A classic indica couch stone. Great for pain and passing time. High focus makes mundane tasks more interesting. Good for very chill activities like watching a movie, going for a walk, or doing repetitive lightweight chores. You can get pretty baked and  still have a good experience with this stuff. Tried from two different growers and the general experience was consistent.”

“Afghan Kush just lives up to its reputation. When I'm around friends I become very talkative. One down side is that this strain is one of the most effective strains at reducing my short term memory down to the point where whatever is the shiniest" thing in the room is usually gets my full attention. Its body and especially head buzz is great
column5: but last for a long time... Some times feels like it intens...”"

column3: “A classic indica couch stone. Great for pain and passing time. High focus makes mundane tasks more interesting. Good for very chill activities like watching a movie, going for a walk, or doing repetitive lightweight chores. You can get pretty baked and  still have a good experience with this stuff. Tried from two different growers and the general experience was consistent.”

“Very good for work and school, I was in my Math class and I was focused on the teacher`s voice. I finish my homework in my class and I was pretty calm all the time, it`s an outstanding kind for people with ADD/ADHD cause you are very focused and you feel ready to work. I was very surprise because Afghan kush is Indica, and I feel like sativa because I was motivate at school with that kind.”
“This is a great strain for ADHD it had me very relaxed it was long lasting.  I got some good rest and i dont usually sleep much but with this strain i was glued to the bed.”
“This is my kind of weed. Heavy indica which makes my eyelids heavy and sends a sensation of fog to my head to nest between my temples... Makes you hungry too. Love these Indicas.”

“Hit the chillum with the AK. This shit is ridiculous. The high is heavy (Get that damned blanket off me) and dampening... and I like it. Don't feel like dancing, but I could have a high talk session while melting into somebodies leather couch. Nice high or should I say a low".”"

“Real indica chill. Girlfriend didn't know I was high (I'd vaped about a gram) before seeing her. She was in a shitty mood and kept picking fights. I was on a whole new level of chill and I just happily fixed all of the problems she was venting about. Early night with a smile. Munchies nearly got me busted though ha ha”
“nice body buzz, makes you extremely happy/euphoric. Smoked with my best friend, had the best night ever”

“Good high, nugs are light green and fluffy. makes you euphoric but very tired and gives you the munchies. Would recommend smoking this at night and not when you have to do something or in the middle of the day.”

“High:great strain for anyone with any type of sleep disorder. It has a little bit of a creep to it, but an hour in the yawns start to come on quite frequently, if you lay down , you WILL go to sleep. In fact due to when i prefer to smoke indicas it was hard to stay awake long enough to even tell i was high anymore. Deffenetly a knock out indica.
taste:was slightly kushy , peppery undertones. with a little skunk funk...”

“Extremely dry tasting very skunk like it smells of fruit, this #3 kino type still makes me dizzy but even though the vape is harsh and thick it's the relaxing indica part that grabs me able to stretch and sit down to get locks of things done. Dark hazy yellow ish dust covering these leafs great for couch lock if you do too much. It's best to treat insomnia, Any hard pain issues, ADHD, and appetite loss great for anor...”
“would have to put this in my top 5 all time. The impact is not fully felt till around 5-10 after smoking. Very HEAVY BODY HIGH ON TOP OF POWERFUL HEAD BUZZ”

“I am a chronic pain and chronic migraine patient, and this strain definitely helped. I also suffer from insomnia and anxiety. Best and most peaceful night of sleep in awhile. This strain gave me wicked giggles and wicked munchies.”

“Understand this. This a not a strain for novice users. Having said that a novice user must try it, one hit will do it for you.. Anymore than that I wouldn't recommend. Now for veteran smokers enjoy its a hell of a high very hash like the name says it all. 
PTSD- Since my reviews are centered around my PTSD, this will calm your symptoms it'll put you at super ease a little goes a long way with this. I recommend this s...”
“nice body buzz, makes you extremely happy/euphoric. Smoked with my best friend, had the best night ever”
“It was hard for me to write review for this strain as I always was too lazy to do it. Also, I always forget to stick a label Sedative. Do not operate heavy machinery" to the jar with Afghan Kush.

column1: Imagine that you are in a middle of a hot summer day. Noon. Sun is scorching. You are sitting in a comfortable chair
column3: drinking a fresh ice-cold drink
column4: and you don't need to do anything.

column3: “Took another round with the afghan fucking did me in again this shit never gets old using, its fun every time. Starts off with you feeling happy and wanting to do stuff for the first couple hours, then if ur not near a couch its game over cuz the couchlock will hit you like a freight train, we all know what that means couch food a lil tv i was still incredibly happy while on the couch, this shit is fire still you wil...”

“Afghan Kush already had my respect before I even tried it. The pure Indica genetics passed down unaltered for thousands of years from the mother land means why change a good thing. This is a straight ahead heavy hitter that does the job for many people looking for relief from stress, pain and insomnia.  The taste and smell is Classic Kush Earthy
column4: Woody and Flowery".  The immediate effects will drop you down a few le...”"

column3:
“SUPER RECOMMEND 

Warning: smoking this strain will make you wander the Afghanistan desert with a AK47 & a turban speaking Arabic for Hours. 

This is one of my favorite strains to smoke 
It makes me sleepy,Relaxed , drowsy , happy , giggly ; paranoid , panicking, seeing Stuff 
It makes me speak Arabic 

I think In my past life I was a Arabian goat seller 
Smoking AfGhan Kush has gave me  PTSD 
Randomly during the da...”
“This was one of my favorites early this year. Great for anxiety and pain relief. Kind of feel like James Brown the jazz musician.”

“Smoked this out of an L after waking up.. had me and my roommate laughing for 2 hours straight.. we both passed out for 4 hours after.. it makes you feel amazing”
“Im not a big indica fan i still enjoy it though but afghans 1 of my favourites definitely very nice tasty smoke with good effects”
“one of the best”
“Great for anxiety, insomnia, and pain. This is a strong and true indica in all consumable forms :) this will make you sleepy, chill, happy, and ease pain. My fav in shatter and bud. 💚”
“This was one of my favorites early this year. Great for anxiety and pain relief. Kind of feel like James Brown the jazz musician.”
“I was pretty sure I was sitting here for at least a few hours, but I just realized it's only been six minutes, so I'm pretty sure it's good.”

“Afghan Kush is a powerful Indica, with a very earthy, faintly sweet smell.  When it's smoked, the taste is woodsy, and somewhat spicy, reminding me a bit of incense or a cozy campfire out in the forest.  This strain is excellent for pain relief, as well as for insomnia and anxiety.  It also would be a good choice for those who have a lack of appetite, as it did send me looking through the fridge.  The high is extreme...”
“one of the best”
“Over all a nice strain. Bit of a head ache though.”

column3: “After my first bowl I thought maybe it was a weaker strain, normally theres a head buzz regardless of strain, some may have more body some more head buzz, this began with zero head buzz so I lighted another bowl.  After the second bowl i began to have a creeping relaxation and body numb with slight vibration.  It intensified and i thought hmm still no head buzz.  it was an excellent strain for pain and anxiety.  It w...”

“this strian is a massive couch locker and produces a nice mellow body high that brings a nice warm spicy herbal taste on the exhale but a nice light sweet taste on the inhale the flower is a nice dark green coloring with nice bright green pistils”

“this is weed  is pretty great im hi off it as i write this this feels like a mixture of weeds indica and sativa  because i feel all warm and tingly and bouncy so it would be good for pain i think it kind of messes with your mind like wierd thoughts this makes you hungry though and its hard to eat with a dry throat so thats a down side overall this is a good weed its pretty strong and it makes you uplifted happy and c...”

“This was the first strain I bought once recreational was legal.  It's like the stuff I used to get back in High school 30 years ago but WAY stronger.  There was a very intense body buzz and I didn't want to move much.  Great for listening to music and banging around the house.  All my aches and pains were forgotten.  I don't know if the pain went away or I just didn't care about it.  It got the job done.
On the downs...”
“Absolute best strain for kickin back or if u have back pain and headaches. 5/5 would buy again.”

column3: “Extremely effective in dealing with stress reduction. Light euphoric effects are also present, working well as an anti-depressant. High seems to display focused paranoia at peak. Dry Mouth is moderate to strong for a long duration (approx. 30 - 40 minutes)”

“This was the first strain I bought once recreational was legal.  It's like the stuff I used to get back in High school 30 years ago but WAY stronger.  There was a very intense body buzz and I didn't want to move much.  Great for listening to music and banging around the house.  All my aches and pains were forgotten.  I don't know if the pain went away or I just didn't care about it.  It got the job done.
On the downs...”

“Post morning I had a lot of memory loss which is unusual for me as this has never occurred before. The over strains I have tried were nothing in comparison to this strain. 4/5 - great quality however the memory loss was a pain. Will have to conduct more experiments to see if the same effects occur”
“Over all a nice strain. Bit of a head ache though.”

“Afghani Kush is a classically pure indica that never disappoints. Dense nugs that have a lime green color stands out from other skunk weed.  The first couple of tokes left me giggly while texting. After a minute, I was super relaxed and had a great night chillaxin "  in bed.  Great smoking. Inhaled smoothly with no coughing. I love this classic strain. It's my favorite.”"
“This strain left me perticulerly happy soon after inhale.”

column3: “wicked tasty strain loved every bit of it. As a lot of people say dont smoke if you have a busy day planned. great for a rainy day or for insomia”
“Really nice trippy indica high. Nice body melt and couch lock. Like I said before it's REALLLY trippy haha.”

“This strain was exactly as i expected. A indica feel with the relaxation and a copacetic kush smell were noted. As i have a cold the smoke was harder to taste but i definitely sensed a cornucopia of earthy flavors with a possible hint of citrus. This kush has big dense buds that are great looking. It leaves one in a great state and is something that although you could use during the day is probably best for the night...”

“Smell: earthy, soil like, woody, not overwhelmingly pungent.
4/5
Effects: powerful sedative, perfect for a late night smoke or after a long day to unwind; more of a locked down high to relax in the moment.
5/5
Looks: clusters of purple and green or white crystals, orange and amber hairs present throughout. Densely packed nugs. 
5/5”
“Plain and simple, I love this shit.  Anything from this lineage works very, very, very well for me.  Great indica w/ a some wonderful cerebral bliss.  :)”
“I love affy, and this stuff is the shit and you have to try it, good body buzz and fun for chill seshes with nachos and a movie”
“I don't specifically like this type of high but I see how is is enjoyable. Very chill, free mind and just happy. Negatives would be laziness and sleepiness.”
“potent af instant effects 🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥💨💨💨💨💨💨💨”

“I grew it in a scrog this year. It is a  very strong, resistant plant with good yield. It streched a bit too much for an indica , tough.  As for the smoke - it is smooth (true kush) , tasting woody with an intense floral note. It is inducing a fast body high that works it's way  from the head to the toes (great potential in pain relief). Great for the last hour before sleep, deffinetly not a daytime smoke.”

“I always come back to this as my favorite strain. I’ve had tons that boasted higher stats but I guess it’s just a body type thing, nothing ever does it for me like Afghan. It’s tough to find around me and growing unfortunately isn’t an option in my state yet but it’s what I’d consider to be the perfect strain. If you like indicas and need pain relief that’s long lasting enough to give you some good feels before givin...”
“Good high, lasts, tingles. Makes you want to lay around and watch TV. Would be cool for a movie. Surprisingly, didn't make me hungry.”
“Very earthy, yet stinky flower. Tastes piney and strong pungent smell.”

Very long lasting semi-powerful stone,
Can be a challenge to remain functional,”

For anyone who just wants to use this recreationally for their own use, they can smoke after a long day at work, I would recommend smoking this at night for a better experience.”

“Dense, sugary, super sticky, sweet, savory, superb, swagged out, smooth, smokeable nugs of pure relaxation and escape from the uncomfortable and unfortunate, unending, unsatisfactory, universe of uneasiness and utter unpleasantness, that is “life” under Late Stage Capitalism in this Unholy Year Of Lord: 2018.

Damn check out that baller ass alliteration up there man. Anyways, as someone who is a huge fan of anything ...”
“I don't specifically like this type of high but I see how is is enjoyable. Very chill, free mind and just happy. Negatives would be laziness and sleepiness.”

“The earthy fragrence and hints of chocolate lead to a strong, steady high. Pretty potent. I did this and it took about 5-10 minutes to set in, so take it easy at first and wait ;-) but when it hits, it hits. Great indica. This bad boy may make you stay up way past your bedtime but you can sleep on it. I just didn't feel like sleeping for a while after taking it. The munchies are real with this one and gradual hunger ...”
“Very earthy, yet stinky flower. Tastes piney and strong pungent smell.”
“Confusing head head. The good kind”
“One of the original top guns, strong indica, smokes great in blunts, will get you sitting on the couch staring at the TV, eating Chips!”

This bad boy may make you stay up way past your bedtime but you can sleep on it. I just didn't feel like sleeping for a while after taking it. The munchies are real with this one and gradual hunger ...”
“Plain and simple, I love this shit.  Anything from this lineage works very, very, very well for me.  Great indica w/ a some wonderful cerebral bliss.  :)”
“I love affy, and this stuff is the shit and you have to try it, good body buzz and fun for chill seshes with nachos and a movie”
“I don't specifically like this type of high but I see how is is enjoyable. Very chill, free mind and just happy. Negatives would be laziness and sleepiness.”
“Confusing head head. The good kind”
“potent af instant effects 🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥💨💨💨💨💨💨💨”
“had some afghan kush....one bud  and 5 hits slow high then whammmm.....great for sleep and relaxing....”

“My friends and I picked this up last minute thinking it was gonna be another normal Friday night. Once we smoked it we ended up watching a South Park marathon and eating about two weeks worth of food. Afghan Kush is great if you don't have any commitments because you wont want to move for the next few hours.”

“Extremely relaxing, smells amazing and the first taste is even better. Works fast and lasts for awhile. Perfect for listening to music and chilling out or watching movies and eating. Definitely eating.”
“potent af instant effects 🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥💨💨💨💨💨💨💨”

“I grew it in a scrog this year. It is a  very strong, resistant plant with good yield. It streched a bit too much for an indica , tough.  As for the smoke - it is smooth (true kush) , tasting woody with an intense floral note. It is inducing a fast body high that works it's way  from the head to the toes (great potential in pain relief). Great for the last hour before sleep, deffinetly not a daytime smoke.”

“Be prepared for the munchies & to kick back on the couch.
Usually not a fan of Indica strains, & despite the munchies, I am pleasantly surprised.
Super relaxing strain, so I wouldn't smoke this during the day unless you have time for a nice long nap.”
“I love affy, and this stuff is the shit and you have to try it, good body buzz and fun for chill seshes with nachos and a movie”
“I loved the taste and the high is great!!  I'm a everyday smoker.”
“So much munchies. I ate like 6 bananas and lots of canned fruit. Overall a good high, got me to focus on the food haha”
“had some afghan kush....one bud  and 5 hits slow high then whammmm.....great for sleep and relaxing....”

“Smoked this when i barely started toking, HIT ME HARD!!...i was a light weight too so i started skating and i felt like it was a hover board!....fucking me and my friend crashed on each other cause i thought i could Ollie over his head......AWSOME STRAIN”
“Little bit goes a long way.”

“I've tried a lot of Kush strains, and I think Afghan Kush is probably one of the most potent.  It's not the best-tasting bud in the world, but it will get you good and high and certainly has some mild to moderate medicinal properties.  I conducted a full-feature professional review of this strain complete with macros and photographs that you can check out here: http://marijuanagames.org/marijuana-strain-review-afghan...”

“Nice strong strain when I first smoked this, A friend of mine ordered this from a medical link. It came on nice, but then made me feel a bit nauseous and gave me a wave of anxiety, that all went away after the first 20 mins then cruised into a nice relaxing,numbing high. Almost like your jolted by lightening for a hot minute. I learned to only blaze a little at a time, but that's really hard to do when a dank strain ...”

“feeling super relaxed thumbs up”

“I would definitely recommend this strain for anyone with insomnia, or depression and also if someone is in pain after a surgery, they can use this to sit down and relax and go to bed happy. OG Kush has always been my go to but could not remember taking this one for a spin.  Back in 2012-2013 I had my med card in AZ so honestly it's been a while.  Told myself 1 hit is all I prob should do.  Tasted so smooth and s...”
“left me super relaxed and anxiety free I feel great !”
“I don't specifically like this type of high but I see how is is enjoyable. Very chill, free mind and just happy. Negatives would be laziness and sleepiness.”
“When I get overwhelmed, a few draws of this makes everything better. It’s good for insomnia, but doesn’t straight knock you out. Takes a fair edge off pain...not enough.”

“Confusing head head. The good kind”

“Love it! Fun to grow, trich city. Whole plant looks dusted. Comparable to hashplant, my favorite strain. A little harsh, but the taste and smoke are awesome. Dries quickly.. High is very comfortable, hard hitting though. Awesome shit!”

“As there is classic music this is classic great bud. I find it pretty sedating. The smell is wonderfully earthy and taste to me is a bit like a good pipe tobacco. Great stuff. Beginners beware. The sedating, couchlocky" high could be a little scary for those not used to a high THC indica. But you should definitely work up to it.”"
“had some afghan kush....one bud  and 5 hits slow high then whammmm.....great for sleep and relaxing....”
“Coolio!”
“This is one of my top notch ones. Pleasantly drifting, ever unwinding, Afghan Kush. Great with a side of coffee if you need to get into a philosophical mood.”

“I'll start by saying that I suffer from severe anxiety and schizophrenia, as to get a reference of where this review is coming from. 

Usually when I smoke (mainly sativa) I get extremely panic induced feelings/thoughts and start having delusions and thoughts associated with panic attacks; of all strains (besides girl scout cookies) this is definitely the first strain that's managed to calm me down almost completely ...”

“Not bad strain. Had a nice smell and tasted good too. smoked this out of a bubbler, a bong, a pipe, and a joint. I found if I smoked just enough to get a good high it was better. If you smoke too much of this, you will find yourself locked on the couch. This strain made me very lazy unless i paced myself. When i did pace myself it gave me a feeling of motivation and comfort. I give it 7/10 because it either knocks yo...”

“Afghan Kush is one of the heaviest Indica (symptom wise) strains i have ever smoked.

The high is very heavy in the sense that you instantly feel the drowsiness aspect of Indica, you can also expect to experience couch-lock, munchies, and cotton-mouth. 

So unless you just plan on staying home for the day i would suggest waiting for a more chilled day or just before bed to smoke this one.”
“This is one of my top notch ones. Pleasantly drifting, ever unwinding, Afghan Kush. Great with a side of coffee if you need to get into a philosophical mood.”

column5: hungry" high.  It makes up what it lacks in sophistication with being very pleasant and fun.”"

column3:
“amazing in general. I very much enjoy the smell (a bit lemon-y and something earthy), doesn't have the geatest taste though, but still is a pleasure to smoke.

This is a very strong strain, you don't need much to get a good high. It makes you very relaxed, especially the body-all you'll want to do is lay down. Everything becomes nicely blurred and very enjoyable-especially music. You'll feel nice and happy.

I think ...”

The high is very heavy in the sense that you instantly feel the drowsiness aspect of Indica, you can also expect to experience couch-lock, munchies, and cotton-mouth. 

So unless you just plan on staying home for the day i would suggest waiting for a more chilled day or just before bed to smoke this one.”

“I love affy, and this stuff is the shit and you have to try it, good body buzz and fun for chill seshes with nachos and a movie”

“I haven't taken a tolerance break in months, so it takes a lot of weed to get me very very high, but after 2 little bowls of this dank, I was there and beyond. 
Granted, I have been smoking mostly sativa and this is an indica, but I doubt that'd make a difference, right? 
Anyway, this strain is my new favorite, and I'm usually not a fan of most indica strains. It's fantastic, try it!!”

“Not bad strain. Had a nice smell and tasted good too. smoked this out of a bubbler, a bong, a pipe, and a joint. I found if I smoked just enough to get a good high it was better. If you smoke too much of this, you will find yourself locked on the couch. This strain made me very lazy unless i paced myself. When i did pace myself it gave me a feeling of motivation and comfort. I give it 7/10 because it either knocks yo...”
“I'm really glad this strain is so cheap in my area because I plan on buying a lot more in the future.”
“First dime. Super dank, super visual high. Better triple baggy.”

“I haven't taken a tolerance break in months, so it takes a lot of weed to get me very very high, but after 2 little bowls of this dank, I was there and beyond. 
Granted, I have been smoking mostly sativa and this is an indica, but I doubt that'd make a difference, right? 
Anyway, this strain is my new favorite, and I'm usually not a fan of most indica strains. It's fantastic, try it!!”

“I really enjoy smoking this Kush but only at certain times of day. It's really great for ultimate relaxation after work and before bed. I wouldn't suggest smoking this before going out anywhere, as it makes you unbelievably lazy.”
“This is one of my top notch ones. Pleasantly drifting, ever unwinding, Afghan Kush. Great with a side of coffee if you need to get into a philosophical mood.”
“First dime. Super dank, super visual high. Better triple baggy.”
“I'm really glad this strain is so cheap in my area because I plan on buying a lot more in the future.”
“Yummy, floral taste, some pain relief, body buzz, couch lock.  Got the chills though.”

“I'm pretty sure this is one of the best strains I've had for chilling out with music and munch. I'm high right now with this weed and I'm feeling unbelievable. I wasn't too happy with the taste it was a bit burnt but once it's smoked you feel good. Real good chill strain. Bed for me now.”

“Tastes very skunky and funky. The high is a creeper. Relaxes your body very well. Okay Stuff. Gives you focus and creativity. Great for if you want to fall asleep. Gives a very sleepy, relaxing, sedative effect and the sleepiness keeps getting stronger as the Afghan creeps up.

3/5”
“Very tasty strain and super tight nugs, high isn't super intense but really enjoyable. Good smell and good bust consistency.”

“As there is classic music this is classic great bud. I find it pretty sedating. The smell is wonderfully earthy and taste to me is a bit like a good pipe tobacco. Great stuff. Beginners beware. The sedating, couchlocky" high could be a little scary for those not used to a high THC indica. But you should definitely work up to it.”"
“This is one of my top notch ones. Pleasantly drifting, ever unwinding, Afghan Kush. Great with a side of coffee if you need to get into a philosophical mood.”
“potent af instant effects 🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥💨💨💨💨💨💨💨”
“left me super relaxed and anxiety free I feel great !”

“Love it! Fun to grow, trich city. Whole plant looks dusted. Comparable to hashplant, my favorite strain. A little harsh, but the taste and smoke are awesome. Dries quickly.. High is very comfortable, hard hitting though. Awesome shit!”
“this is fucking awsome”
“Such a relaxing high, this strain is amazing.”
“Dazed and Confused Lazy Blend....Hungry!!!”
“love love love !”
“Holy Christ this will put hair on a ape's ass! Afghan Kush is the Most potent Kush I've consumed it's very harsh but has long lasting euphoric effects defiantly one for your shopping list”
“Good overall smoke.  Relaxing and tiring, good smell, good burn.  High lasts a ok amount of time.”
“This Landrace is a trustworthy source of many beautiful plants, classic taste and high, can't go wrong.”
“Made me feel all tingly and relaxed. I was in the park, and I just dropped on the nearest bench. Intense appetite aswell.”
“GOT ME SO HIGH”

“This bud is really just a classic indica that will make you eat your whole fridge. It really creeps up on you after about 5 minutes like a true kush and will leave in a serious couch lock. Me and my buddy smoked 3 grams of this shit and we were high the next day.”

“While I am relatively new to the cannabis world I know a thing or two about marijuana. this was an amazing strain and would suggest this to anyone with spinal problems. it was very smooth when I used my bong. had a great taste hard for me to describe though.”
“good weed. hard to come by where  i live”

“I've been going through a mild stage of depression and I hit this strain up and it really does make you feel so in tune with the world around you. you appreciate the little things so much more. 

I really do rate this strain as one of the best highs I've ever had. 

Need something to lift your spirits after a long day? this is the strain for you.”

“Awesome body buzz...MAJOR munchies! Feel great, but I don’t want to eat everything in the house! 

Definitely an evening strain”
“Great high, just very very very harsh smoke. Harshest I’ve ever had tbh.”
“Just hits the back of your eyes sometimes, very relaxing. Nigh time Indica choice for any one, but might be a bit much for a light smoker tho. Overall A”
“awesome strain ,very fruity smell, and is a great body high.”
“Classic good bud”
“Eignet sich gut für abends.”

“Definitely a potent, great tasting strain with beautifully tight, dense nugs, but this didn't give me the indica high I was expecting. Not sure if the dispensary I got it from mislabeled it or if it didn't spend enough time in flower cycle to build up some more dark trichromes, but who knows... This strain was pretty strong. I wouldn't recommend it to beginners as it was kind of hard to focus after smoking it. I was ...”
“budtoker was a newbie on this kush.....5 rips off the one bud and i was gone for 4hrs......oh yea made sex much nicer....”

“Definitely gave me the muchies and worked good on cold pains (headache). A++

Cons: Dry mouth was bad but manageable.”
“This is a good end of the day strain, very relaxing, numbs your body. Kinda hard to think tho, gives me decent munchies too”
“Two big indicas crossed resulting in a stony high that is long lasting as well as boring”
“Very relaxing and great flavor!”
“This was like a very nice coffee smooth smoke in hash form”
“Relaxing and also helps ease stress.”

“sleepy time!! i may have had an older strain but the flavor profile is shit. I did not enjoy the  taste and didn't notice all the subtleties, but would definitely recommend and enjoy again for the body relaxing effects and the couch lock.”
“This strain had a very powerful body high that was extremely relaxing, and the effects intensified for about a half over after i stopped smoking it. left me happy the rest of the day”
“Very nice relaxing high, strong smell”
“Had me having cotton mouth but for my eyes. I couldn't keep them open. 😂”
“toke after toke”

“The smell just make me want to swim in it, smell hint of sweet and woody. I used a water bong for this, after two hit, exhaling was smooth and shortly after that I am feeling good! I am loving the what was I stressing about?" feeling haha. For those to have a flip
column4: this strain makes me want to go on walk and I had no back pain
column6: I can walk longer instead of usually cutting it short due to pain. it gave my w...”"

column3: “Tried this strain again. Much better than last time, does make you very sleepy and good for that quick head change you're seeking.”
“very potent but good, relaxing, sleepy high. can give you the spins if youre not careful.”
“Pretty dank stuff. Perfect for lazy days or before u go to bed. Probably not something u should smoke on ur lunch break. 😂”
“rather tasty buds are very nice a bit darker than I like but very good so very passable”
“very good smoke smooth , relaxed and ready to hit the hay at any time ,also very potent and loaded with thc would highly recommend to anyone”
“Very relaxing strain. Soothes the body with muscle relaxant like effects while easing the mind nicely. This strain also helped mellow out anxiety experience from a previously consumed strain. Nice!”

“this was a very good strain. I bought 10 grams and couldn't be more pleased. it does keep me on my ass though which makes meditation a long lasting beautiful dream. I really felt at ease all day. at times I found myself in a giggly mood. the munchies weren't that bad for me honestly it was kind of mind over matter.  I am thinking of switching to a sativa though as I craved the energy at times to just go for my usual ...”
“I love this strain and the relaxation it gives off”
“It makes me feel creative. It is good to try, a common name and a good choice. :)”

“A good strain for the evening if consumed in moderate ammounts. Bin Laden Kush as its also called, will kick in relatively slowly at first but then will hit hard. This strain is really bad if youre trying to focus. I recommend this if you just wanna feel care free and if you dont have any tasks at hand. Overall a very good strain for weekend afternoons.”
“Love this Strain, I have bad insomnia and this helps me pass out early and gets me through the whole night”
“Probably one of my favorite strains. It's what I call a good old-fashioned high. Happy hungry relaxed and gigging out lol.”
“Such a good strain. Mellows you out and makes you giggle. Great for anyone with anxiety.”
“Best I've had, trailing GSC. Tastes of flowers and dandelions on a toasted spring morning.  Laughs outweigh fatigue.”

“Very strong indica. I dont smoke as often as Iuse to and tried this to get a good sleep. ended up keeping me awake a bit longer then i wanted to be. i got a pretty outrageous cough and dry mouth that i couldnt shake. Next time id smoke it a few hours before going to bed give myself time to reach that sleepy stage in the high. I didnt get any anxiety but i could see some people reacting to the initial hit a bit worse ...”

“Got the seeds from World Of Seeds, grown under LED, hydroponics DWC, Palgron only nutrients-my fav indica strain, heavy body effect, great smell and taste :) put some guys to sleep :) nice yield too 192g/1plant”
“Mind opening while relaxing. If you like Banana Kush, you will like this.”
“Fuck this bud makes me feel so numb, spark a bowl and ten minutes later my face is melting holy shit lol and I couldn't stop laughing for like an hour straight”

“Knocking the shit out of me, pretty good taste, pretty harsh smoke, a bit irritating. But still knocking me to sleep. Cant really focus on this Venom movie review. I am a bit depressive thinking about my future. Goals being reached or not...pretty good sad strain i dont know what im saying.”
“This strain put me on my ass now I'm stuck playin dragon ball : xenoverse”
“Great for chilling”
“Best when rolled in a blunt, good strain but I've found you really need to get this strain hot”

“Only been smoking around 2 years but this strain has definitely been the most potent for me. I'm a bong smoker and after about 2 decent hits you're knocked out for hours tripping hard and zoning out constantly. Can get super dizzy too if you're not careful, even for experienced smokers. This is the only strain that I've almost thrown up from but t I wouldn't worry about that. Once you get past the initial shock of ho...”
“Definitely relaxing”

“I personally don't enjoy couch-locking strains. Does not really give you a head high, but a body buzz. Very good strain for relaxing before going to sleep, not very good for socializing. 
Oh and it will give you ridiculous munchies”
